response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and the value it brings, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is an exceptional chance to acquire a product that exceeds expectations at a significant discount. I believe this offer will not only benefit you financially but also align with your goals and aspirations. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 14000}
